column5: This dude caught a shark from his Kayak.  Hey Jediangler.....Just do it!  click here: My Webpage       This kayak/shark fishing thing  is getting more and more appealing.
I know a guy in South west Florida that does it all the time... he once got pulled around for 2 hours by a 300 pound bull shark
Wow...A kayak sure looks like bait to big fishies like that!!!!
Hey snag, here's a link to a forum of kayak fishing only. Loads of great stories and helpful tips for kayak fishermen. http://kfs.infopop.cc/groupee/forums
it would have been neat to do something like that but i don't want to get that fish to pissed off
Thanks!  Time to get a few 'yak threads started.......
